Reviews.Title: Great little tab for the buck!!!
Reviews.Author: rebecca a schumann

Plays movies, has front and back camera for taking pictures or videos. Browses the internet, does facebook and more. I recommend this product

Reviews.Title: I highly recommend this product.
Reviews.Author: Julia Motchalova
Reviews.Content: This was Perfect for the  price. This was a gift for my daughter. She uses it to watch netflix and play games. It also allowed me to get my tablet back :)

Reviews.Title: Nice and price worth it.
Reviews.Author: Kathy Miller
Reviews.Content: worth the price, has google play. does freeze once in awhile. xmas gift. the girls ages 8 and 10 really love them.

Reviews.Title: Gifted :]
Reviews.Author: Forever84
Reviews.Content: I purchased the black one for myself and the pink one as a gift for my sister and I can honestly say she loves it! Maybe it's not a Samsung Galaxy tablet or an Ipad but for the price is a great buy. I was looking for something inexpensive yet of good quality very glad I saw this tablet and decided to go with it!! The only thing she mentioned about her tablet is that the battery dies on her a few times but let's face it, as a 16 year old girl ... she DOESN'T CHARGE THE THING! Anyways, I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for to buy a tablet for games, movies etc... and doesn't want to spend hundreds of dollars.

Reviews.Title: Pick another Tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Laura C Torres
Reviews.Content: This tablet is not the best quality.  I got 2 of them and charged them fully.  First they have a very weak wifi signal (you have to literally sit in the wifi room to get a signal).  Second they only hold a charge for a short time, very short.  Third, they would power off at random while using them and sometimes they were hard to power on after charging.  Also it took forever to download new apps.  I know you get what you pay for, but this was ridiculous.  We paid a little more for a named brand tablet, and it was VERY worth it!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this! You will regret it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: -Battery does not last long-It turns itself off/dies at random intervals-It works very slowly-The casing is cheap plastic-I wouldn't even get this for a child-Even though this is inexpensive- you still don't get what you pay for.This isn't negative feedback towards the seller, just the product. I have requested to return mine because it keeps turning itself off every five seconds and I am waiting to hear back.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended! Great price!  Works wonderfully!
Reviews.Author: Mrs G
Reviews.Content: This tablet is wonderful.  It is very user friendly.  I opened it and played You Tube videos perfectly.  I purchased this as a gift for my granddaughter to keep her off her mother's smart phone.  Now, she can play games on it and pink is perfect for her!!

Reviews.Title: Great ablet
Reviews.Author: neat
Reviews.Content: This is a must have if you're looking for a great tablet for a decent price .. It searches with web , does utube , allows you to download apps and more . My granddaughter loves the tablet . I would recommend you to buy . I will be getting one for my grandson soon

Reviews.Title: excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It does everything it says! I bought 2 for my daughters and the love them. I'm thinking about getting one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Earnest Banks. This tablet is great!!!
Reviews.Author: Earnest Banks
Reviews.Content: This tablet is fast compared to any name brand tablet,and I like the camera it takes very clear pictures,and I like its design.Earnest Banks

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Harriet Allen
Reviews.Content: After I had it for about a month it got hard to get the cord to stay in the tablet to charge it. Within two weeks the cord would just fall out and I could not charge it anymore. I wrote the company a note about it but so far have heard nothing from them. I would not have given one star rating but had to so I could write a review.

Reviews.Title: hurt my feelings in one week
Reviews.Author: aaron robinson
Reviews.Content: it never connected to wifi and now the charger port's innards have come out so it is useless to my baby girl after she waited so long and was so excited to get it. one week and her heart is broken and so is mine now

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought
Reviews.Author: Proudmom
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet as a gift. The person loves it. Occasionally there may be a glitch or freeze but overall she loves it and I might have to order another for myself.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Michele "b52michele"
Reviews.Content: This thing didn't even last a week. I only used one app on it and it would occasionally just crash or turn off. After a few days (of very minor use) it became difficult to turn on - the power button would only work sometimes, then it stopped working completely. It would show that it was charging, but would not turn on.In addition, the battery life is short and dies quickly even if you are not using it.The only good thing was that my return was accepted without difficulty. Wish I never wasted the money on the shipping to/from, though.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price!!
Reviews.Author: vanesa evans
Reviews.Content: Overall this product is ok, I purchased this tablet for my 6yr old daughter and she likes it so far. She has been using the tablet for about a month and we had only one issue with it, which was that the tablet would shut off randomly even if it was fully charged and would not turn back on unless you plugged it back into the charger. However, we contacted the supplier and were able to fix the problem. As far as the PROS for the device I would say obviously price was great, speed and responsiveness is ok some delay at time but not too bad, comes loaded with PlayStore so you are able to download the same apps you would have on your android phone and has a 2 cameras not the best pictures quality especially in low lighting but like I said my daughter is only six not a deal breaker. The cons would be the battery life drains rather fast and the screen is difficult to see, you have to find the right angle to reduce the glare. I'm am pleased with the purchase its a good starting tablet if you don't want to spend $200+ on a tablet that your child may break or lose.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I love how light weight it is.  Its a great hot pink color! The front camera was a lot nicer than I expected! And the back camera is awesome.  I'm also glad it uses the android app store!

Reviews.Title: Not worth your time.
Reviews.Author: Shawna C.
Reviews.Content: I bought this thinking it would be a great tablet. I had issues with the tablet connecting to my router. ( I was in the same room as it) It would connect to the internet then after some time would disconnect. I would check the wifi and all it would say was connecting, but would not reconnect. I contacted the seller through email and they had me to a reset to the tablet. The tablet did the same thing. I had to pay to resend the tablet back to them. I would suggest just buying a different tablet. At the time of purchasing this one My boyfriend bought a Dragon Touch and he has yet to have a issue with it. I also have purchased and Dragon Touch tablet after returning this tablet and have yet had a issue since receiving it.

Reviews.Title: Very frustrating....
Reviews.Author: Megan Hale
Reviews.Content: Mine is junk... It keeps powering itself down and sometimes it will exit itself out of an app while in the middle of using it. It has done this since the first day I got it. It is very very frustrating! Don't buy it... I'm not picky about things but this is down right ridiculous and disappointing...

Reviews.Title: Not worth your time or money!
Reviews.Author: N. Sancey
Reviews.Content: CAUTION! ONLY 3 HOURS AVERAGE on a battery charge??! Did not even last 2 hours, then the charger quit working, and I could not charge it using the supplied USB cable. I paid $7.50 to send it back, but I had spent $67.50 on this order. QUANTUM stated that this tablet was perfect so they charged a RESTOCKING FEE: refund was $54.00!!! But Amazon took care of the difference via A to Z claim.I do not think it was honest to tell me that it was in perfect condition, when the charger for both of them quit working (I had purchased 2 of them.Thank you AMAZON for your support via the A to Z claim. I will buy again from Amazon but I will never purchase anything from Quantum.

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: was a gift , and the they love it they use it every chance they get just to see the smile on her face is worth it
